mapper.select: /* homeMapper.selectRandomArchive */ SELECT U.USER_UID AS userUid , U.ARCHIVE_NAME AS archiveName , GET_ARCHIVE_URL_PATH(U.USER_UID) AS archiveUrlPath , GET_ARCHIVE_LOGO(U.USER_UID) AS archiveLogo , F.URL_PATH AS profileImagelUrlPath FROM USER U LEFT JOIN `FILE` F ON F.FILE_UID = U.PROFILE_IMAGE_UID WHERE U.FLAG_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
